attributes.action: Keep gyms open during the national lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
Gyms are essential for people's physical and mental wellbeing, also, it may not be possible for people to excersize outside due to the cold, rainy weather of the winter months.

Furthermore, there is yet to be any evidence proving that indoor gyms cause the spread of the coronavirus as members follow strict guidelines to stay safe.
attributes.background: Keep all indoor gyms open during the new national lockdown and class them as essential.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
